pullRequest.title: Gh 1836 mini accumulo changes 2
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request builds on the previous gh-1836-mini-accumulo-changes one.
It now includes changes to unit tests for federated-store to eliminate their use of Mock Accumulo, mostly in favour of MiniAccumuloCluster use.
There are also changes to accumulo-rest for replacement of mock with mini accumulo use in the unit tests.
Finally there are changes to some of the documentation that reference MockAccumuloStore.
See below for further comments.

nodes.bodyText: Not really sure this will work as you'll probably get a hostname resolution failure
Won't this fail because the manager checks the class is Mini or SingleUseMini? Would changing the class to extend Mini and modifying the check to also look at extensions work?
Can you use two temporary folders to skip this?
Can you remove the Test part of this as it's used outside of tests? Something Like MiniAccumuloClusterManager would be more descriptive.
Some of the setup logic seems to be repeated here and other classes. Would it be possible to move the PropertiesDrivenTest from sparkaccumulo and use it here?
don't you need to use localhost?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,9 +13,9 @@
 # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 # limitations under the License.
 #
-gaffer.store.class=uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.accumulostore.SingleUseMockAccumuloStore
-accumulo.instance=byteEntityInstance
-accumulo.zookeepers=aZookeeper
+gaffer.store.class=uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.accumulostore.SingleUseMiniAccumuloStore
+accumulo.instance=accumuloInstance
+accumulo.zookeepers=zookeeper
